div.p: Distance Learning begins March 30! We look forward to having you in the "virtual classroom." Click on "More" below for information on FREE Meals for ALL students. Students need proper nutrition to learn!

div.p: District Office: 4707 North Road, Circle Pines, MN 55014

The District Office will be closed to the public through May 4, 2020.
If you need assistance, please call 763.792.6000 and leave a message, or send an email to the appropriate staff.
Calls will be returned as soon as possible.
